modName: Dual Sheath Redux - Gizmodians Real Silver Sword
descriptionHtml:
As was requested, I knocked out the Dual Sheath patch for Real Silver Swords. For those of you that want it, here it is. All DSR patches i put together should eventually get moved to the DSR page as a link, and would be available that way, but for the mean time.. you can get it now at the introductory price of $0.00 USD. :) hope you all enjoy.

Required Mods:
Gizmodian's Real Silver Swords - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3780/?
Dual Sheath Redux - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?

Installation Notes:
If you are using NMM than pick the file appropriate to your original download. The models are the same for both standalone and replacer, just the file hierarchy is different. If you plan on installing manually, then either file will work.

All Credit goes to Neovalen for his Dual Sheath Redux and Gizmodian for her Real Silver Swords.

Permissions to alter this are not given, obviously you would need to contact either original author of these mods. Permission was given to me to create the Dual Sheath Patch. Enjoy!
author: Scuffed_down
